Text: Seed It,Rate It and Comment Here!!

did u follow Installation Process??? patch should be in the folder with the program.

@xteen94
*Just install it
*Copy patch to install directory
*Done!!

If u r using 64bit then 
C:Program Files(x86)Internet Download Manager
